title: Stir-fried chicken and noodles in plum sauce
description: These quick chicken noodles make a speedy, filling supper for two, and the Chinese flavours will add some variety to your weeknight roster.

method.Step 1: Stir-fry the chicken strips in sunflower oil until browned.

method.Step 2: Add a handful of baby corn and the pak choi. Stir-fry for 2 minutes with a dash of water, then add the egg noodles, plum sauce and water.

method.Step 3: Toss until the noodles are piping hot.
